targets.query: SELECT last(total_dc_power) FROM mqtt_consumer  fill(previous)
SELECT last(export_power_hybrid) FROM mqtt_consumer fill(previous)
SELECT last(load_power_hybrid) FROM mqtt_consumer fill(previous)
SELECT last(battery_power) * last(state_battery_charging) FROM mqtt_consumer fill(previous)
SELECT last(battery_level) FROM mqtt_consumer fill(previous)
SELECT last(daily_pv_generation) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(daily_pv_export) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(export_power_hybrid) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE time > now()-1d group by time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(daily_direct_energy_consumption) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(daily_battery_charge_from_pv) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT $kapazitaet * battery_level / 100 * 3600 / battery_power  FROM (SELECT last(battery_level) as battery_level, last(battery_power) as battery_power, last(battery_voltage) as battery_voltage, last(battery_current) as battery_current, last(state_battery_discharging) as battery_discharging FROM mqtt_consumer) where  battery_discharging = 1

SELECT ($kapazitaet - $kapazitaet * battery_level / 100) * 3600 / battery_power  FROM (SELECT last(battery_level) as battery_level, last(battery_power) as battery_power, last(battery_voltage) as battery_voltage, last(battery_current) as battery_current, last(state_battery_charging) as battery_charging FROM mqtt_consumer) where  battery_charging = 1
SELECT last(daily_battery_discharge_energy) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(daily_import_energy) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(battery_power) * last(state_battery_charging) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE time > now()-1d group by time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(daily_direct_energy_consumption) + last(daily_battery_discharge_energy) + last(daily_import_energy) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT (hausverbrauch - netzbezug) / hausverbrauch * 100 from (SELECT (last(daily_direct_energy_consumption) + last(daily_battery_discharge_energy) + last(daily_import_energy)) as hausverbrauch, last(daily_import_energy) as netzbezug FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval))
SELECT (PV - Netzeinspeisung) / PV * 100 FROM (SELECT last(daily_pv_generation) as PV, last(daily_pv_export) as Netzeinspeisung FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval))
SELECT last(load_power_hybrid), time FROM mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(system_state) FROM mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(battery_voltage) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(battery_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(battery_voltage) * last(battery_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(previous)
SELECT last(battery_state_of_healthy) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last(total_battery_charge_from_pv) FROM forever.mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(total_battery_discharge_energy) FROM forever.mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(total_battery_charge_from_pv) * 1000 / $kapazitaet FROM forever.mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(total_battery_discharge_energy) / last(total_battery_charge_from_pv) * 100 FROM forever.mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(total_pv_generation) FROM forever.mqtt_consumer fill(previous)
SELECT last(total_pv_export) FROM forever.mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(total_direct_energy_consumption) FROM forever.mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(total_import_energy) FROM forever.mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(total_direct_energy_consumption) + last(total_battery_discharge_energy) + last(total_import_energy) FROM forever.mqtt_consumer

SELECT (hausverbrauch - netzbezug) / hausverbrauch * 100 from (SELECT (last(total_direct_energy_consumption) + last(total_battery_discharge_energy) + last(total_import_energy)) as hausverbrauch, last(total_import_energy) as netzbezug FROM forever.mqtt_consumer)
SELECT (PV - Netzeinspeisung) / PV * 100 FROM (SELECT last(total_pv_generation) as PV, last(total_pv_export) as Netzeinspeisung FROM forever.mqtt_consumer)
SELECT mean(total_dc_power) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(export_power_hybrid) * -1 FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE export_power_hybrid < 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean(load_power_hybrid) from $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(pv_estimate) FROM forever.solcast WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(battery_power) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE state_battery_charging = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(0)
SELECT mean(battery_power)  FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE state_battery_discharging = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(0)
SELECT mean(battery_voltage) * mean(battery_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(none)
SELECT mean(export_power_hybrid) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE export_power_hybrid > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean(battery_level) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean(SOC) FROM bydhvs WHERE category='Diagnosis' and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: PV Leistung, PV-Prognose, Sonnenstand, Netz Leistung, Speicherleistung, Speicher SoC und Hausverbrauch

targets.query: SELECT mean(export_power_hybrid) * -1 FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE export_power_hybrid < 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(battery_power) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE battery_discharging = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(load_power_hybrid) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(export_power_hybrid) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE export_power_hybrid > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(battery_power) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE state_battery_charging = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(total_dc_power)  FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(mppt_1_voltage) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(mppt_2_voltage) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(mppt_1_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(mppt_2_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(total_dc_power) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(mppt_1_current) * mean(mppt_1_voltage) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(mppt_2_current) * mean(mppt_2_voltage)  FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(mppt_1_current) * mean(mppt_1_voltage) + mean(mppt_2_current) * mean(mppt_2_voltage) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT total_dc_power FROM mqtt_consumer where time > now() - 5m
SELECT sum(daily_pv_generation) FROM (SELECT max(daily_pv_generation) as daily_pv_generation FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

SELECT sum(value2) from (SELECT sum(value1) /1000 as value2 from (SELECT mean(pv_estimate)  / 2 as value1 FROM forever.solcast WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP by time(1d)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Gruppierung)
SELECT sum(daily_pv_generation) FROM (SELECT max(daily_pv_generation) as daily_pv_generation FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT sum(daily_pv_export) FROM (SELECT max(daily_pv_export) as daily_pv_export FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

SELECT sum(daily_battery_charge_from_pv) FROM (SELECT max(daily_battery_charge_from_pv) as daily_battery_charge_from_pv FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT (max(daily_direct_energy_consumption) + max(daily_battery_discharge_energy) + max(daily_import_energy)) as value FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT sum(daily_import_energy) FROM (SELECT max(daily_import_energy) as daily_import_energy FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

SELECT sum(daily_battery_discharge_energy) FROM (SELECT max(daily_battery_discharge_energy) as daily_battery_discharge_energy FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT (max(daily_direct_energy_consumption) + max(daily_battery_discharge_energy) + max(daily_import_energy)) as value FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT mean(battery_temperature) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(internal_temperature) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(internal_temperature) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(battery_temperature) FROM mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(battery_level) FROM (SELECT max(battery_level) as battery_level FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT mean(battery_level) FROM (SELECT min(battery_level) as battery_level FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

SELECT sum(daily_battery_charge_from_pv) FROM (SELECT max(daily_battery_charge_from_pv) as daily_battery_charge_from_pv FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

SELECT sum(daily_battery_discharge_energy) FROM (SELECT max(daily_battery_discharge_energy) as daily_battery_discharge_energy FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT  mean(battery_power) * mean(state_battery_charging) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT sum(export_power_hybrid)  FROM (SELECT max(export_power_hybrid) / 1000 as export_power_hybrid FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE export_power_hybrid > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

SELECT sum(export_power_hybrid) * -1 FROM (SELECT min(export_power_hybrid) / 1000 as export_power_hybrid FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE export_power_hybrid < 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT mean(phase_a_voltage) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(phase_b_voltage) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(phase_c_voltage) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(total_reactive_power) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(phase_a_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(phase_b_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(phase_c_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(grid_frequency) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(phase_a_voltage) * mean(phase_a_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(phase_b_voltage)  * mean(phase_b_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(phase_c_voltage)  * mean(phase_c_current) FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(linear)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT (max(daily_direct_energy_consumption) + max(daily_battery_discharge_energy) + max(daily_import_energy)) as value FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)

SELECT sum(daily_import_energy) FROM (SELECT max(daily_import_energy) as daily_import_energy FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT sum(daily_pv_generation) FROM (SELECT max(daily_pv_generation) as daily_pv_generation FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT sum(daily_pv_export) FROM (SELECT max(daily_pv_export) as daily_pv_export FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT (last(total_direct_energy_consumption) + last(total_battery_discharge_energy)) * $strompreis +  last(total_pv_export) * $verguetung FROM forever.mqtt_consumer
SELECT (last(total_direct_energy_consumption) + last(total_battery_discharge_energy)) * $strompreis FROM forever.mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(total_pv_export) * $verguetung FROM mqtt_consumer
SELECT last(total_import_energy) * $strompreis   FROM mqtt_consumer

SELECT sum(value)*$strompreis FROM (SELECT (max(daily_direct_energy_consumption) + max(daily_battery_discharge_energy) + max(daily_import_energy)) as value FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT sum(value)*$strompreis  FROM (SELECT max(daily_import_energy) as value FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT sum(value) * $verguetung FROM (SELECT max(daily_pv_export) as value FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)) GROUP BY time($Gruppierung) fill(null)
SELECT system_state FROM $rp.mqtt_consumer WHERE $timeFilter

list.definition: select rp from forever.rp_config where time >= now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1
list.label: Retention Policy
list.name: rp
list.query: select rp from forever.rp_config where time >= now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1
